sentences.en: Clever tailoring can flatter your figure.
sentences.cn: 巧妙的裁剪可以使你的身材显得优美。

sentences.en: He kept trying to start the car and the battery got flatter and flatter, until it wouldn't turn the engine at all.
sentences.cn: 他反复试着发动车子，但电池的电越来越少，最后根本就打不着火了。

sentences.en: I flatter myself I've done it all rather well.
sentences.cn: 我认为自己已经做得相当好了。

sentences.en: I flatter myself that I have spared no pains.
sentences.cn: 我自问是花过不少力气的.

sentences.en: I flatter myself that this campaign will put an end to the war.
sentences.cn: 我自认为这次战役将结束这场战争。

sentences.en: I knew she was just flattering me.
sentences.cn: 我知道她只是在奉承我。

sentences.en: It is disingenuous of him to flatter me.
sentences.cn: 他对我阿谀奉承,是居心叵测.

sentences.en: It turns my stomach to hear him flatter.
sentences.cn: 听到他拍马屁,我实在感到讨厌.

sentences.en: My philosophy of fashion is that I like to make clothes that flatter.
sentences.cn: 我的时尚理念就是我喜欢做让人穿着更显漂亮的衣服。

sentences.en: Orange and khaki flatter those with golden skin tones.
sentences.cn: 橘黄色和卡其色能衬托那些金黄色皮肤的人。

sentences.en: Perry would always flatter Mrs. Mitchell by praising her cooking.
sentences.cn: 佩里常常奉承米切尔太太，称赞她的烹调手艺。

sentences.en: Strong colours would flatter her pale skin and dark hair.
sentences.cn: 亮颜色更能衬托她的白皮肤和黑头发。

sentences.en: That dress really flatters your figure.
sentences.cn: 那件连衣裙很显你的身材。

sentences.en: The landscape became wider, flatter and very scenic.
sentences.cn: 地势变得更开阔、更平整，风景十分优美。

sentences.en: We flatter ourselves that we provide the best service in town.
sentences.cn: 我们相信我们提供的服务在本市最好.

sentences.en: You can make your stomach look flatter instantly by improving your posture.
sentences.cn: 通过采取更好的坐姿，你的腹部马上就会看起来平坦一些。

sentences.en: You flatter yourself. Why would we go to such ludicrous lengths?
sentences.cn: 你真自以为是。我们为什么要费那么大的力气？

trans.tran_cn: 奉承，自以为是，使显得更漂亮
trans.tran_en: to praise someone in order to please them or get something from them, even though you do not mean it

trans.tran_cn: 向…谄媚， 奉承； 使满意， 使感到荣幸； 使显得好看， 使显得突出
trans.tran_en: to praise someone in order to please them or get something from them, even though you do not mean it
